no-transactions: We could not find any transactions to show.
ledger-not-found: We can not find that ledger yet
earliest-ledger: The ledger <1>{{minLedger}}</1> is the earliest ledger available.
earliest-ledger-mainnet: The ledger <1>32570</1> is the earliest ledger available, approximately the first week of XRPL history, <3>ledgers 1 through 32569 were lost due to a mishap in 2012</3>.
ledger-continue: Because the {{ledgerName}}'s state is recorded in every ledger version, the ledger can continue without the missing history.
